summary: An ordinance fixing the rate of taxes to be levied and levying the taxes upon taxable property in the City of Seattle, both real and personal, needed to raise sufficient revenue to carry on the different departments of the municipal government for the ensuing fiscal year, to-wit: for the year beginning on the 1st day of January, 1908, and ending on the 31st day of December, 1908, including the interest to accrue during said year on the bonded debt of the City of Seattle.
